title: Happy Friday
body:
Happy Friday Summoners! 
Hope you all embrace the new patch with open arms and I'll see you soon on the fields of justice! 

Kind Regards,
lols =)

replies.body:
> [Completely safe link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kfVsfOSbJY0)... Enjoy

You have a very different definition of safe to me ;_;
How's the weather over your way Alice? It's stinking hot where I am!
It is a cool 16ยบ C right now in Los Angeles, but then it is always pretty nice around here.
Love that fact you used Celsius Alice :)

So bad...
It's like trying to put in a food process all the bad music and video produced in the 80' and 90'...
...
...
but now it's stuck in my head!!!!!!

Seppy why you do this to me!..
...
...
...

it's Friday... friday...

I know how to stop this.... [you are welcome World](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KAQhG59zqZc)
OMG Mirkinen. To think I wanted to play a game with you sometime! This song is just as bad!
Unless you're one of the random chatrouletters no.
Loote, please! Don't encourage that {{champion:150}} sty song.
I am interested to see how cho goes after his PBE nerf
Hehe, Mirkinen's comment. But no, I hate you Alice (jks). That temperature is just. OMG. Bring it to me now.

Hey lols, I hope you too enjoy the new patch!
Happy Friday, everyone.
